title: Fatty Finn
creator_credit: Maurice Murphy, Brian Rosen, Finn Films, Australian Film Commission and Children's Film Corporation
brief_description: Film version of Australia’s comic strip, set in the years of the depression. Fatty is head of the neighbourhood nice guys and has a final confrontation with Bruiser Murphy and his gang of toughs. Stars Noni Hazlehurst and Bert Newton.
creator_credit_for_label: Maurice Murphy, Brian Rosen, Finn Films, Australian Film Commission and Children’s Film Corporation
